title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, March 9, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of Vita Sackville-West (1892), who said, "It is necessary to write, if the days are not to slip emptily by.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Vita Sackville-West (1892), who said, "It is necessary to write, if the days are not to slip emptily by.”
